newsitem.title: THAILAND: Thai March C/A deficit widens to 15.9 bln baht.
newsitem.headline: Thai March C/A deficit widens to 15.9 bln baht.

text.p: Thailand's March current account deficit widened to a preliminary 15.7 billion baht from a 14.7 billion baht deficit in February, the Bank of Thailand said on Thursday.
Note - Figures in billions of baht.
